thread.title: Power outage at LaGuardia Airport causes 3-hour delays
thread.title_full: Power outage at LaGuardia Airport causes 3-hour delays

author: Fred Imbert
title: Power outage at LaGuardia Airport causes 3-hour delays
text:
Mehdi Taarmallah | AFP | Getty Images LaGuardia Airport, New York City A power outage at New York's LaGuardia Airport on Friday is causing delays of up to three hours for some arriving planes.
"Due to current power outages affecting airlines operating in Terminal C, Parking Lots 4 and 5, flight disruptions may result. Please check with your airline to determine if your flight is affected," LaGuardia Airport said.
Flightaware.com said LaGuardia-bound planes have been delayed at their origin on average of nearly three hours.
